# Use

```{r setup}
library(aureole)
```

## Get URLs for species images

```{r}
df <- get_image_urls_from_name("Homo sapiens")
knitr::kable(df)
```

## Search for the IDs of a species

```{r}
df <- download_search_results("Homo sapiens")
knitr::kable(df)
```
